achievements: Pulitzer Prize winner for her work on the New York Times reporting team that exposed widespread sexual harassment in Hollywood.
Author of several books, including 'The Yellow House' and 'We Are All Completely Beside Ourselves'.
Bestselling author known for her novels exploring complex ethical and social issues.
Published over 25 novels, many of which have been adapted into films and television shows.
Voice of Ariel in Disney's animated film 'The Little Mermaid'.
Broadway actress with roles in productions such as 'Crazy for You' and 'The Pirates of Penzance'.
